entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
